properties.displayName: App Service and Function apps should route configuration traffic over the virtual network
properties.description: Configuration routing affects operations that happen before or during startup of your app. Virtual network routing handles how both app and configuration traffic are routed from your virtual network and out.

metadata.description: 'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
